survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Flexible Workspace Solutions Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and behaviors regarding flexible workspace solutions, including coworking spaces, hybrid offices, and remote work setups.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use flexible workspace solutions (e.g., coworking spaces, hot desks, hybrid offices)?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use flexible workspace solutions (e.g., coworking spaces, hot desks, hybrid offices)?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features are most important to you in a flexible workspace? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format. Limit selections to 3 to prioritize preferences.

script.question_text: Which of the following features are most important to you in a flexible workspace? (Select up to 3)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' to Q1

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you use flexible workspace solutions?
answer_options: Work requirements (e.g., employer policy, client meetings)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an optional open-text follow-up for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you use flexible workspace solutions?
answer_options: Work requirements (e.g., employer policy, client meetings)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' to Q1

questions.question_text: If you have never used flexible workspace solutions, what is the main reason?
answer_options: Lack of availability in my area
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format with an 'Other' option for detailed feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an optional open-text follow-up for 'Other'.

script.question_text: If you have never used flexible workspace solutions, what is the main reason?
answer_options: Lack of availability in my area

questions.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to use flexible workspace solutions more often?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly.
